MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the KY2 area of Kirkcaldy. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:34pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required to our equipment near Broadleys and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:51pm on Monday, 05 April 2021
